source.14dda66d:
#loading data
DIR = '../input/'

df_free = pd.read_csv(DIR + 'freeFormResponses.csv', low_memory=False, header=[0,1])
df_choice = pd.read_csv(DIR + 'multipleChoiceResponses.csv', low_memory=False, header=[0,1])
schema = pd.read_csv(DIR + 'SurveySchema.csv', low_memory=False, header=[0,1])

# Format Dataframes
df_free.columns = ['_'.join(col) for col in df_free.columns]
df_choice.columns = ['_'.join(col) for col in df_choice.columns]
schema.columns = ['_'.join(col) for col in schema.columns]

# For getting all columns
pd.set_option('display.max_columns', None)

# Filter only for Germany
# Excluding students
df = df_choice[(df_choice['Q3_In which country do you currently reside?'] == 'Germany') & 
              (df_choice['Q6_Select the title most similar to your current role (or most recent title if retired): - Selected Choice'] != 'Student') &
              (df_choice['Q7_In what industry is your current employer/contract (or your most recent employer if retired)? - Selected Choice'] != 'I am a student') &
              (df_choice['Q6_Select the title most similar to your current role (or most recent title if retired): - Selected Choice'] != 'Not employed')] 
#&
#              (df_choice['Q9_What is your current yearly compensation (approximate $USD)?'] != 'I do not wish to disclose my approximate yearly compensation')]

# Excluding following industries - Academics/Education
df = df[df['Q7_In what industry is your current employer/contract (or your most recent employer if retired)? - Selected Choice'] != 'Academics/Education']
print('Number of respondents: ', df.shape[0])
source.cf13bce3:
#df.head(1).T

def groupby_and_plot(col, question, sort=False):
    gr = pd.DataFrame(df.groupby(col).size())
    gr = np.round(100*gr/gr.sum())
    gr = gr.reset_index()

    gr.columns = ['question', 'percent']
    if sort:
        gr = gr.sort_values(by = 'percent', ascending=False)
        
    pal = sns.color_palette("Greens_d", gr.shape[0])
    rank = gr['percent'].values.argsort()

    ax = sns.barplot(x='percent', y='question', data=gr, palette=np.array(pal[::-1])[rank])
    ax.set(xlabel='Percentage', ylabel='Answers', title=question)
    sns.despine()
source.f5325d85:
col = 'Q1_What is your gender? - Selected Choice'
question = "What's your gender?"

gr = pd.DataFrame(df.groupby(col).size())
gr = np.round(100*gr/gr.sum())
gr = gr.reset_index()

gr.columns = ['response', 'percent']
gr = gr.sort_values(by = 'percent', ascending=False)
gr = gr[gr.percent > 0]

ax = sns.barplot(x='percent', y='response', data=gr, 
                 palette=np.array(['#2DA5EA', '#4c4c4c', '#4c4c4c', '#4c4c4c']))
ax.set(xlabel='Percentage', ylabel='Response', title=question)
sns.despine()
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
#display(gr)

source.f7bf1f05:
col = 'Q4_What is the highest level of formal education that you have attained or plan to attain within the next 2 years?'
question = "What's the highest level of your formal education?"

gr = pd.DataFrame(df.groupby(col).size())
gr = np.round(100*gr/gr.sum())
gr = gr.reset_index()

gr.columns = ['response', 'percent']
gr = gr.sort_values(by = 'percent', ascending=False)
gr = gr[gr.percent > 0]

ax = sns.barplot(x='percent', y='response', data=gr, 
                 order=['Some college/university study without earning a bachelor’s degree',
                        'Bachelor’s degree','Master’s degree', 'Professional degree', 
                        'Doctoral degree','I prefer not to answer'],
                 palette=np.array(['#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#2DA5EA','#2DA5EA','#2DA5EA','#4c4c4c']))
ax.set(xlabel='Percentage', ylabel='Response', title=question)
sns.despine()
#plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

col = 'Q9_What is your current yearly compensation (approximate $USD)?'
question = 'What is your current yearly compensation (approximate $USD)?'

gr = pd.DataFrame(df.groupby(col).size())
gr = np.round(100*gr/gr.sum())
gr = gr.reset_index()

gr.columns = ['response', 'percent']
gr = gr.sort_values(by = 'percent', ascending=False)
gr = gr[gr.percent > 0]

ax = sns.barplot(x='percent', y='response', data=gr, 
                 order=['I do not wish to disclose my approximate yearly compensation', 
                        '0-10,000', '10-20,000', '20-30,000', '30-40,000', '40-50,000', 
                        '50-60,000', '60-70,000',  '70-80,000', '80-90,000','90-100,000',
                        '100-125,000', '125-150,000', '150-200,000'],

source.cca83af7:
col = 'Q10_Does your current employer incorporate machine learning methods into their business?'
question = 'Does your current employer incorporate machine learning methods into their business?'

gr = pd.DataFrame(df.groupby(col).size())
gr = np.round(100*gr/gr.sum())
gr = gr.reset_index()

gr.columns = ['response', 'percent']
gr = gr.sort_values(by = 'percent', ascending=False)
gr = gr[gr.percent > 0]

ax = sns.barplot(x='percent', y='response', data=gr, 
                 order = ['No (we do not use ML methods)',
                          'We are exploring ML methods (and may one day put a model into production)',
                          'We use ML methods for generating insights (but do not put working models into production)',
                          'We recently started using ML methods (i.e., models in production for less than 2 years)',
                          'We have well established ML methods (i.e., models in production for more than 2 years)',
                          'I do not know'],
                 palette=np.array([ '#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#2DA5EA','#4c4c4c']))
ax.set(xlabel='Percentage', ylabel='Response', title=question)
sns.despine()
#plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
#display(gr)

source.28284583:
col = 'Q23_Approximately what percent of your time at work or school is spent actively coding?'
question = 'What percent of your time at work is spent actively coding?'

gr = pd.DataFrame(df.groupby(col).size())
gr = np.round(100*gr/gr.sum())
gr = gr.reset_index()

gr.columns = ['response', 'percent']
gr = gr.sort_values(by = 'percent', ascending=False)
gr = gr[gr.percent > 0]

ax = sns.barplot(x='percent', y='response', data=gr, 
                 order = ['0% of my time','1% to 25% of my time',
                          '25% to 49% of my time','50% to 74% of my time',
                          '75% to 99% of my time', '100% of my time'],
                 palette=np.array([ '#83132B','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#2DA5EA','#2DA5EA',
                                   '#2DA5EA','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c']))
ax.set(xlabel='Percentage', ylabel='Response', title=question)
sns.despine()
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
#display(gr)
source.b9580cda:
col = 'Q26_Do you consider yourself to be a data scientist?'
question = 'Do you consider yourself to be a data scientist?'

gr = pd.DataFrame(df.groupby(col).size())
gr = np.round(100*gr/gr.sum())
gr = gr.reset_index()

gr.columns = ['response', 'percent']
gr = gr.sort_values(by = 'percent', ascending=False)
gr = gr[gr.percent > 0]

ax = sns.barplot(x='percent', y='response', data=gr, 
                 order = ['Definitely not','Probably not','Maybe', 
                          'Probably yes','Definitely yes'],
                 palette=np.array([ '#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#2DA5EA','#2DA5EA',
                                   '#2DA5EA','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c','#4c4c4c']))
ax.set(xlabel='Percentage', ylabel='Response', title=question)
sns.despine()
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

# Q34_Part_2_During a typical data science project at work or school, approximately what proportion of your time is devoted to the following? (Answers must add up to 100%) - Cleaning data
# Q34_Part_3_During a typical data science project at work or school, approximately what proportion of your time is devoted to the following? (Answers must add up to 100%) - Visualizing data
# Q34_Part_4_During a typical data science project at work or school, approximately what proportion of your time is devoted to the following? (Answers must add up to 100%) - Model building/model selection
# Q34_Part_5_During a typical data science project at work or school, approximately what proportion of your time is devoted to the following? (Answers must add up to 100%) - Putting the model into production
# Q34_Part_6_During a typical data science project at work or school, approximately what proportion of your time is devoted to the following? (Answers must add up to 100%) - Finding insights in the data and communicating with stakeholders
